Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26802742]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli NBRC 14237(MIC<12.5 µM);Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 12582(MIC<50 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC<12.5 µM);Micrococcus luteus NBRC 12708(MIC<50 µM);Fungi:Candida albicans NBRC 1594(ND).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26802742]1.5% Hemolysis against Rat erythrocytes at 50 µM.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: 3.6%,4.7%,7.3% α-helix were mearsured by CD spectra at 10 °C, 25 °C and 37 °C in 10 mm Tris-HCl (pH 7.2);28.6%,26.8%,22.8% α-helix were mearsured by CD spectra at 10 °C, 25 °C and 37 °C in 50% TFE.
Sequence Information.Comments: Induced a significant and dose-dependent histamine release.
